column5: Hi all- we are leaving this saturday morning for a weeks trip in northern Ontario and would like to know if anyone can tell us where to exchange money on a saturday.I am not sure if banks are open or not. Thanks in advance. Dave

If you are crossing at Pigeon River, Rydens Border Store offers a pretty good exchange rate. Some banks are open in Thunder Bay on Saturday, TD Canada Trust on the corner of Harbour Expressway and Memorial Ave and also right across the street there is a CIBC bank that is also open on Saturdays.Good Luck Fishing!
Most banks are open 10am to 3 pm on Saturdays and they will give you the best rates of exchange.Keep releasing them allRichard Collinhttp://www.trophymuskiecharters.com

I don't bother with exchanging. I use the credit card for misc presents to take home, which seems to give a good exchange rate. The camp where we stay seems to be very close. Maybe I am loosing more than I think, but my time on Saturday going and returning is at a premium.Enjoy your trip - I am going this Saturday! Can't wait.
